QuestData.Title: A Shadow In The Ice
QuestData.Description:
I've heard whispers while passing through Camp Antonidas. Talk of mutilated fauna being found across the icy steppes. Some nothing more than bloody splatters.
Whatever it is, it's got the mages scared and made the local wildlife scarce.
Poke around the top of the glacier. If I was a betting dwarf, I'd say that's where any apex predator worth its salt would stake its claim.
Bring me a piece of it so we can soothe the Kirin Tor.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A malicious giant who revels in playing with his prey.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the top of the glacier that overlooks Camp Antonidas.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Hemet Nesingwary Jr. in Camp Nowhere.
